original_text: King Zedekiah of Judah and all his soldiers tried to escape when they saw them. They left the city at night. They took a path through the king's garden and went through the gate between the two walls of the city. Then they ran towards the Jordan Valley.
korean_text: 유다의 시드기야 왕과 모든 군사가 그들을 보고 도망하되 밤에 왕의 동산 길을 따라 두 담 샛문을 통하여 성읍을 벗어나서 아라바로 갔더니

sentences.original_text: tried to escape when they saw them
They left the city at night
They took a path through the king's garden
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 왕의 정원을 지나는 길로 갔습니다

sentences.original_text: and went through the gate between the two walls
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 두 성벽 사이의 문을 통과했습니다

sentences.original_text: Then they ran towards the Jordan Valley
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 요단 계곡을 향해 달려갔습니다
